bundle.shortDescription: An unofficial desktop version of the W3Schools TryIt Editor for practicing HTML coding.
bundle.longDescription: This is an unofficial desktop version of the W3Schools TryIt Editor, developed to provide a convenient environment for practicing HTML coding. Users can experiment with HTML code and immediately see the results, making it a useful tool for learning and testing. Future plans include adding more features, such as file system integration and support for additional programming languages, to further enhance the development experience.

security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self'; connect-src 'self'; object-src 'none';
